name: Get Astra Non-Vector DB Schema
description: Get Schema from a non-vector Astra DB (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.inputs import StrInput, MultilineInput, SecretStrInput, IntInput, DropdownInput
from axiestudio.schema.message import Message
from langchain_community.utilities.cassandra_database import CassandraDatabase
from langchain_core.tools import Tool
from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from typing import Union
from axiestudio.schema import Data

class AstraNonVectorDB(LCToolComponent):
    display_name: str = "Astra Non Vector DB Schema Tool"
    description: str = "Get Schema from a non-vector Astra DB"
    documentation: str = "https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/cassandra_database/"
    name: str = "AstraDB"
    icon: str = "AstraDB"

    inputs = [
        SecretStrInput(
            name="token",
            display_name="Astra DB Application Token",
            info="Enter your application token.",
            required=True
        ),
        SecretStrInput(
            name="database_id",
            display_name="Astra DB Database ID",
            info="Enter your database ID.",
            required=True
        ),
        MessageTextInput(
            name="keyspace",
            display_name="Astra DB Keyspace",
            info="Enter your keyspace.",
            required=True
        ),
    ]
    
    def run_model(self) -> Union[Data, list[Data]]:
        wrapper = self._build_wrapper()
        results = wrapper.run({"keyspace": self.keyspace})
        self.status = results
        return results
    
    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        wrapper = self._build_wrapper()
        return Tool(
            name="cassandra_query",
            description="Query Cassandra for whatever",
            func=wrapper.run,
        )

    def _build_wrapper(self):
        try:
            import cassio
        except ImportError:
            raise ImportError(
                "Could not import cassio package. "
                "Please install it with `pip install cassio`."
            )
        try:
            from langchain_community.utilities.cassandra_database import CassandraDatabase
            from langchain_community.tools.cassandra_database.tool import (
                GetSchemaCassandraDatabaseTool,
                GetTableDataCassandraDatabaseTool,
                QueryCassandraDatabaseTool,
            )
        except ImportError:
            raise ImportError(
                "Could not import langchain CassandraDB integration package. "
                "Please install it with `pip install langchain-community`."
            )
        
        cassio_init_kwargs = {
            "token": self.token,
            "database_id": self.database_id,
            "keyspace": self.keyspace,
        }

        cassio.init(**cassio_init_kwargs)
        session = cassio.config.resolve_session()
        if not session:
            raise Exception(
                "Check environment configuration or manually configure cassio connection parameters"
                )
        db = CassandraDatabase()
        schema_tool = GetSchemaCassandraDatabaseTool(db=db)
        session.set_keyspace(self.keyspace)
        
        return schema_tool
code.name: code

node.description: Get Schema from a non-vector Astra DB
